comment.author: 11946814@N02
comment._content: Great capture of a great ship!

comment.author: 73199923@N00
comment._content:
Indefatigable was present at the formal surrender of the Japanese on 2 September in Tokyo Bay. She later helped to repatriate Allied POWs held in Japan 

The vast business dispensing with war materiel and returning people to their peacetime places begun in 1945. In some cases the tasks would take years.

The British Pacific Fleet congregated in Sydney through December 1945 and January 1946, 

This would have been one of the busiest times the great port of Sydney had ever seen.
